setKickstartTree

public int setKickstartTree(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                            java.lang.String kslabel,
                            java.lang.String kstreeLabel)
Change kickstart tree (and base channel if required) of an existing kickstart profile.

Parameters:
sessionKey - User's session key.
kslabel - label of the kickstart profile to be changed.
kstreeLabel - label of the new kickstart tree.
Returns:
1 if successful, exception otherwise.

setChildChannels

public int setChildChannels(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                            java.lang.String kslabel,
                            java.lang.String[] channelLabels)
Set child channels for existing kickstart profile.

Parameters:
sessionKey - User's session key.
kslabel - label of the kickstart profile to be updated.
channelLabels - labels of the child channels to be set in the kickstart profile.
Returns:
1 if successful, exception otherwise.

importFile

public int importFile(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                      java.lang.String profileLabel,
                      java.lang.String virtualizationType,
                      java.lang.String kickstartableTreeLabel,
                      java.lang.String kickstartFileContents)
Import a kickstart profile into RHN. This method will maintain the url/nfs/harddrive/cdrom command in the kickstart file rather than replace it with the kickstartable tree's default URL.

Parameters:
sessionKey - User's session key.
profileLabel - Label for the new kickstart profile.
virtualizationType - Virtualization type, or none.
kickstartableTreeLabel - Label of a kickstartable tree.
kickstartFileContents - Contents of a kickstart file.
Returns:
1 if successful, exception otherwise.

importFile

public int importFile(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                      java.lang.String profileLabel,
                      java.lang.String virtualizationType,
                      java.lang.String kickstartableTreeLabel,
                      java.lang.String kickstartHost,
                      java.lang.String kickstartFileContents)
Import a kickstart profile into RHN, overriding the url/nfs/harddrive/cdrom command in the file and replacing it with the default URL for the kickstartable tree and kickstart host specified.

Parameters:
sessionKey - User's session key.
profileLabel - Label for the new kickstart profile.
virtualizationType - Virtualization type, or none.
kickstartableTreeLabel - Label of a kickstartable tree.
kickstartHost - Kickstart hostname (of a satellite or proxy) used to construct the default download URL for the new kickstart profile. Using this option signifies that this default URL will be used instead of any url/nfs/cdrom/harddrive commands in the kickstart file itself.
kickstartFileContents - Contents of a kickstart file.
Returns:
1 if successful, exception otherwise.

createProfile

public int createProfile(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                         java.lang.String profileLabel,
                         java.lang.String virtualizationType,
                         java.lang.String kickstartableTreeLabel,
                         java.lang.String kickstartHost,
                         java.lang.String rootPassword)
Create a new kickstart profile using the default download URL for the kickstartable tree and kickstart host specified.

Parameters:
sessionKey - User's session key.
profileLabel - Label for the new kickstart profile.
virtualizationType - Virtualization type, or none.
kickstartableTreeLabel - Label of a kickstartable tree.
kickstartHost - Kickstart hostname (of a satellite or proxy) used to construct the default download URL for the new kickstart profile.
rootPassword - Root password.
Returns:
1 if successful, exception otherwise.

createProfileWithCustomUrl

public int createProfileWithCustomUrl(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                                      java.lang.String profileLabel,
                                      java.lang.String virtualizationType,
                                      java.lang.String kickstartableTreeLabel,
                                      java.lang.String downloadUrl,
                                      java.lang.String rootPassword)
Create a new kickstart profile with a custom download URL.

Parameters:
sessionKey - User's session key.
profileLabel - Label for the new kickstart profile.
virtualizationType - Virtualization type, or none.
kickstartableTreeLabel - Label of a kickstartable tree.
downloadUrl - Download URL, or 'default' to use the kickstart tree's default URL.
rootPassword - Root password.
Returns:
1 if successful, exception otherwise.

addScript

public int addScript(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                     java.lang.String ksLabel,
                     java.lang.String contents,
                     java.lang.String interpreter,
                     java.lang.String type,
                     boolean chroot)
Adds a script to a kickstart profile

Parameters:
sessionKey - key
ksLabel - the kickstart label
contents - the contents
interpreter - the script interpreter to use
type - "pre" or "post"
chroot - true if you want it to be chrooted
Returns:
the id of the created script

removeScript

public int removeScript(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                        java.lang.String ksLabel,
                        java.lang.Integer id)
Removes a kickstart script from the associated kickstart

Parameters:
sessionKey - key
ksLabel - the kickstart to remove a script from
id - the id of the kickstart
Returns:
1 on success

                                          java.lang.String ksLabel,
                                          java.lang.String host)

Parameters:
sessionKey - key
ksLabel - the label to download
host - The host/ip to use when referring to the server itself
Returns:
the kickstart file

setPartitioningScheme

public int setPartitioningScheme(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                                 java.lang.String ksLabel,
                                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> scheme)
Set a kickstart profile's partitioning scheme.

Parameters:
sessionKey - An active session key.
ksLabel - A kickstart profile label.
scheme - The partitioning scheme.
Returns:
1 on success
Throws:
FaultException

getPartitioningScheme

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPartitioningScheme(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                                                              java.lang.String ksLabel)
Get a kickstart profile's partitioning scheme.

Parameters:
sessionKey - An active session key
ksLabel - A kickstart profile label
Returns:
The profile's partitioning scheme. This is a list of commands used to setup the partitions, logical volumes and volume groups.
Throws:
FaultException
